Class MenuBarController

java.lang.Object
  MenuBarController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, SessionListener
public class MenuBarController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, SessionListener

This class handles the control over all menu items except the predefined tool list from ObjectDraw.
